comment: Desh gulam raha hai, un rajaon ke wajah se, jo kabhi ek jut hokar nahi rahe. Come to think of it, it was never a single country it was many kingdoms that finally came together in the fight to oust british. India realized it is a country and acted like one during the freedom strug

comment: Isme galat kya hai? Brahmins and kshtriyas had more restrictions and more responsibilities. If they didnt follow dharma they were outcasted immediately. And why the hell are you cribbing. until mulayam & Lalu brainwashed you, you were kshtriyas too subjected to same standards
